experiences.organization: Center for Biosystems and Biotech Data Science, Ghent University
experiences.description: Conducted research at the intersection of computational biology and medical AI, focusing on DNA sequence modeling and surgical video understanding with deep learning.
bullets: Devised a DNA data augmentation method by mimicking silent mutation processes.
Predicted DNA-to-protein translation initiation likelihood with a CNN model.
Built a pre-trained CNN model for surgical datasets with self-supervised learning.
achievements: Delivered a reproducible pipeline for DNA augmentation usable across related projects.
Established a baseline CNN for translation initiation prediction to support downstream analyses.
Prepared pre-trained surgical-vision features to accelerate labeling and model development.

experiences.organization: Center for Biosystems and Biotech Data Science, Ghent University
experiences.description: Summer internship focused on object detection for medical images and surgical video analytics.
bullets: Conducted research on object detection for medical image and video analysis.
Developed an object detection algorithm for surgical video analysis.
achievements: Implemented a working detection prototype applicable to laparoscopic scenarios.
Documented dataset preparation and evaluation protocols for reuse.

experiences.description: Explored parasitic infection effects using single-cell RNA-seq analysis and dimensionality reduction workflows.
bullets: Experimented on the effects of parasite infection with UMAP-based visualization.
Analyzed raw single-cell RNA-seq data using bioinformatics tools (e.g., R) to discover cell populations present during a disease stage.
achievements: Produced annotated cell-cluster visualizations supporting hypothesis generation.
Standardized a minimal scRNA-seq preprocessing script for lab members.

experiences.organization: Center for Biosystems and Biotech Data Science, Ghent University
experiences.description: Applied deep learning to DNA sequence modeling; investigated model sensitivity to point mutations.
bullets: Applied deep learning models for prediction and evaluation.
Executed point mutations in DNA and analyzed their effect on deep neural network predictions, focusing on translation initiation site prediction.
achievements: Established a mutation-testing protocol to measure model robustness on genomic inputs.
Shared reproducible notebooks for mutation impact analysis with the group.
